sys_remote_update_set.description: Sports Operations Management - Complete venue operations platform for stadiums, arenas, and sports venues. Includes game-day control center, facility management, staff scheduling, incident response, and mobile portal.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Sports Operations Management v1.0.0
sys_remote_update_set.summary: Complete sports venue operations management solution with: - Game Day Control Center with real-time dashboard - Facility maintenance management with automated workflows - Staff scheduling and resource management - Incident response system with mobile reporting - Role-based security and access control - External system integrations (ticketing, security, BMS, weather) - Mobile-optimized Service Portal - Comprehensive reporting and analytics
